channel.title: Graphs on Dollarman
channel.description: Recent content in Graphs on Dollarman

item.title: Cumulative Price Percents
item.description: The cumulative percent change indicates how much each pair has changed since 1 hour before the start of the graph (called Day 0). Each point on the graph indicates how much total percent change an investment would have made from Day 0 to that point.

item.title: Cumulative Volume Percents
item.description: The cumulative percent change indicates how much each pair has changed since 1 hour before the start of the graph (called Day 0). Each point on the graph indicates how much total percent change an investment would have made from Day 0 to that point.

item.title: Price Percent Changes
item.description: Measures the hourly percent changes in price for 2 given pairs.

item.title: Price Percent vs Volume Percent
item.description: Shows the correlation between Price Percent Change and Volume Percent Change of each pair.

item.title: Price vs Volume
item.description: Shows the correlation between Price and Volume (the actual values) for each pair.

item.title: Prices (pair vs pair)
item.description: Each bar represents the correlation in prices between 2 pairs. A strong positive correlation indicates that both pairs rise together and fall together in price. A strong negative correlation implies as one pair is being “pumped” the other is “dumped” in price.

item.title: Volume Percent Changes
item.description: Measures the hourly percent changes in volume for 2 given pairs.

item.title: Volumes (pair vs pair)
item.description: Each bar represents the correlation in volume between 2 pairs. A strong positive correlation indicates that both pairs rise together and fall together in volume. A strong negative correlation implies as one pair is being “pumped” the other is “dumped” in volume.
